# Li-Ta Hsu (許立達) — LLM index

## Canonical
- Site: https://qmohsu.github.io/
- Email: lt.hsu@polyu.edu.hk
- ORCID: https://orcid.org/0000-0002-0352-741X

## Summary
Li-Ta Hsu is an Associate Professor at The Hong Kong Polytechnic University (AAE). He works on robust positioning and navigation, including GNSS/PNT, urban navigation, multipath/NLOS mitigation, integrity monitoring, factor graph optimization, and multi-sensor fusion (GNSS/IMU/LiDAR/camera), with applications to autonomous systems and smart devices.

## Best pages to read
- Home: https://qmohsu.github.io/
- Research: https://qmohsu.github.io/research/
- Open resources: https://qmohsu.github.io/open/
- Talks: https://qmohsu.github.io/talks/
- CV (PDF link): https://qmohsu.github.io/cv/

- LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/li-ta-hsu/

## Keywords
GNSS, PNT, RTK, PPP-RTK, urban canyon positioning, multipath mitigation, NLOS mitigation, integrity monitoring, factor graph optimization, GNSS/INS, sensor fusion, LiDAR, VIO, SLAM, smartphone GNSS, Android GNSS
